name: postgres-explorer
description: PostgreSQL database explorer for VS Code with notebook support

host.description: Hostname or IP address of the PostgreSQL server

port.description: Port number of the PostgreSQL server

postgresExplorer.aiProvider.description: AI Provider to use for query assistance

postgresExplorer.aiApiKey.description: API Key for direct AI providers (OpenAI/Anthropic)

postgresExplorer.aiModel.description: Model name (e.g., gpt-4, claude-3-opus). Leave empty for defaults.

scripts.vscode:prepublish: npm run esbuild-base --minify && npm run esbuild-renderer --minify
scripts.esbuild: npm run esbuild-base --sourcemap && npm run esbuild-renderer --sourcemap
scripts.esbuild-watch: npm run esbuild-base --sourcemap --watch & npm run esbuild-renderer --sourcemap --watch
